Class SimpleCache

class SimpleCache

Cache specific stuff

Initialization (constructor)

Constructor Detail

SimpleCache()

void SimpleCache()

Initialization (constructor)

Method Detail

dropCache()

void dropCache(string $name, [string $section])

Remove a cached element

Parameters:
name - Name of the cache object (e.g. 'cat_123')
section - Section it belongs into (e.g. 'cat'); will be used as cache subdir if set

getCache()

void getCache(string $content, string $name, [string $section])

Read cache

Parameters:
content - String to place the cache contents into (passed by reference)
name - Name of the cache object (e.g. 'cat_123')
section - Section it belongs into (e.g. 'cat'); will be used as cache subdir if set

getCacheFilename()

string getCacheFilename(string $name, [string $section])

Evaluate cache file name

Parameters:
name - Name of the cache object (e.g. 'cat_123')
section - Section it belongs into (e.g. 'cat'); will be used as cache subdir if set
Returns:
filename

getCacheUnixTime()

integer getCacheUnixTime(string $name, [string $section])

Obtain cache LastMod UnixTimestamp

Parameters:
name - Name of the cache object (e.g. 'cat_123')
section - Section it belongs into (e.g. 'cat'); will be used as cache subdir if set
Returns:
UnixTimeStamp of last modification

setCache()

void setCache(string $content, string $name, [string $section], [string $timestamp])

Write cache

Parameters:
content - Content to be put to cache. If empty, corresponding cache file will be removed
name - Name of the cache object (e.g. 'cat_123')
section - Section it belongs into (e.g. 'cat'); will be used as cache subdir if set
timestamp - Timestamp to apply to cache file (YYYY-MM-DD)
